price: Estarán en él por toda la eternidad; no encontrarán quién los proteja ni los auxilie.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
